app.title: CalmCampus
home.subtitle: Choose a space to explore. We are here with calm, kind support.
chat.title: AI Buddy
chat.note: You can chat as a guest. Sign in only if you want cloud sync or to share a DSA summary.
chat.unavailable: Buddy is unavailable right now. Please try again soon.
chat.customize.title: Customise your AI companion
chat.customize.desc: Choose the voice and creativity level you like. This stays in guest mode unless you opt in to sync.
chat.share_all.desc: Include mood, timetable, tasks, sleep, movement, cycle, and support contacts (on-device only).
timetable.title: Timetable
timetable.empty.title: No classes yet
timetable.empty.subtitle: Add your first class with details like course code, type, venue, lecturer, and time range.
timetable.plan.subtitle: Plan your week and choose whether to keep reminders as a guest or with an account.
timetable.sheet.add: Add a class to your timetable
timetable.courseCode.recent: Pick a recent code to save typing:
timetable.timeError: Please pick both start and end times.
timetable.delete.title: Remove this class?
settings.title: Settings
settings.cloud.desc: If you sign in with your CalmCampus account, you can back up your mood, sleep, tasks, and other logs to Supabase so they are available if you switch devices.
settings.backup.needLogin: Please sign in on the Auth page before backing up your data.
settings.backup.success: Your data has been backed up to the cloud.
settings.backup.error: We could not back up your data right now. Please check your connection and try again.
auth.name: Preferred name
auth.name.helper: We will greet you with this name.
auth.name.error: Please share a name we can use.
auth.email.error: Email helps us keep your space personal.
auth.email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
auth.welcome.title: Welcome to CalmCampus
auth.welcome.subtitle: A gentle place to check in with yourself. Create an account or log in to keep your mood, tasks, and calming tracks in one spot.
auth.success: You are {state}. Your data will stay on this device and is also backed up to your account.
auth.error.login: We could not log you in right now. Please try again.
auth.error.signup: We could not create your account right now. Please try again.
auth.error.generic: Something went wrong while contacting the server. Your local data is still safe on this device.
auth.sync.pullFailed: You are signed in, but we could not pull your cloud data yet. Please check your connection and try again later.
auth.cta.toSignup: New here? Create a gentle space.
auth.cta.toLogin: Already have an account? Log in.
auth.privacy: Your reflections stay private. If you ever feel unsafe, please reach out to campus support or a trusted person.
announcements.title: Latest news
announcements.empty.title: No news yet
announcements.empty.desc: Tap "New post" to share a gentle update from DSA or counselling.
announcements.compose.title: New wellness update
announcements.compose.summary.helper: One or two sentences students see first.
announcements.compose.body.helper: Keep it gentle and clear. Add helplines if relevant.
announcements.compose.notify.desc: Students will see this as a push alert on this device.
announcements.delete.title: Remove this post?
announcements.delete.desc: This will remove the post from your device.
common.error.offline: You are offline. Please check your connection and try again.
tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.summary.title: Study planner
tasks.summary.subtitle: Keep your tasks light and doable today.
tasks.sort.title: Sort tasks
tasks.empty.title: Nothing here yet
tasks.empty.subtitle: Add one gentle task to get started.
tasks.field.title: Title
tasks.field.subject: Subject / module
mood.title: Mood Check-in
mood.subtitle: We will personalise this check-in using your saved name.
mood.instruction: Tap the option that matches your mood.
mood.note.label: Want to add a note?
mood.note.hint: Any thoughts you want to remember today
mood.error.select: Please choose how you feel today.
breathing.title: Breathing Exercises
breathing.intro: Short guided breathing to help your body settle. Start an exercise to see clear prompts and a countdown.
breathing.exercise.box.name: Box Breathing (4-4-4-4)
breathing.exercise.box.desc: Steady four-count inhale, hold, exhale, hold to reset stress.
breathing.exercise.478.name: 4-7-8 Calm
breathing.exercise.478.desc: Gentle nervous system downshift before sleep or study.
breathing.exercise.gentle46.name: Gentle 4-6 Breathing
breathing.exercise.gentle46.desc: Beginner-friendly slow inhale and longer exhale to soften tension.
breathing.exercise.quick.name: Quick Calm (1 minute)
breathing.exercise.quick.desc: Fast reset when you need one minute to steady yourself.
breathing.finished.note: Nice work. Notice if your shoulders feel softer now.
breathing.instructions: Follow the prompts to complete {cycles} cycles.
history.title: Mood History
history.error.title: We could not load your moods right now.
history.error.retry: Please pull down to try again.
history.empty: No moods saved yet. Your check-ins will show up here.
relax.title: Relax & Meditations
relax.intro: Layer a calming ambient bed with a short guided focus or sleep session. You can play ambient and guided audio together.
relax.breathing.title: Guided breathing
relax.breathing.desc: Short guided breathing to help your body settle when stress spikes. Start to follow clear prompts and a countdown.
relax.section.ambient.title: Ambient soundscapes
relax.section.ambient.desc: Soft textures to play while you study or rest.
relax.section.guided.title: Guided series
relax.section.guided.desc: Pick a Focus, Stress Relief, or Sleep session to match how you want to feel.
help.title: Help Now
help.card.app.title: This app is not an emergency service
help.card.app.desc: If you or someone else is in danger, please contact local emergency services.
help.card.dsa.title: Contact DSA counselling
help.card.mentor.title: Reach out to a trusted mentor
help.card.mentor.desc: Pick a lecturer or mentor you feel safe with and ask for a quick check-in.
help.card.hotline.title: Crisis hotlines
help.contacts.title: My safe people
help.contacts.desc: Save the people you feel safe with. They will show up here for quick calls or messages.
help.contacts.tip: These open your phone apps (calls, WhatsApp, email).
help.empty.title: No contacts saved yet
help.empty.desc: Add a trusted friend, sibling, or mentor so they appear here when you need them.
help.error.launch: Could not open that contact right now.
journal.title: Journal
journal.intro: Write a few lines to yourself. This stays on your device unless you choose to log in.
journal.field.label: What is on your mind?
journal.empty.loggedIn: No journal entries yet. Your reflections will be stored here.
journal.empty.guest: Log in first so we can keep your journal safe and ready for next time.
journal.nudge: Log in to save your journal so it stays here.
dsa.title: DSA Summary
dsa.prompt: Choose a range to build a wellbeing summary you can share with your mentor.
dsa.preview.title: Summary preview
dsa.preview.body: You logged moods on 8 days. Most frequent feeling: okay. Top themes: academics, rest.
challenges.title: Common Challenges
challenges.intro.title: You are not facing these alone.
challenges.intro.desc: Each section links to tools already in CalmCampus so you can act quickly.
challenges.study.title: When studies feel overwhelming
challenges.study.desc: Break the week into one next step. Short focused blocks and generous breaks are okay.
challenges.social.title: When people feel scary
challenges.social.desc: Social anxiety is tough. Start with one safe person or a short text message.
challenges.exhausted.title: When you are exhausted or numb
challenges.exhausted.desc: Slow down. Drink water, stretch, and pick one tiny task to finish.
challenges.lonely.title: When you feel lonely or homesick
challenges.lonely.desc: Reach out to a friend, join a quiet study space, or step outside for fresh air.
challenges.dark.title: When your thoughts get dark
challenges.dark.desc: You are not alone. Text someone you trust and tap Help Now for crisis hotlines anytime.
weather.title: Weather & Planning
weather.intro.title: Check the weather before heading to campus.
weather.intro.desc: Knowing if it will be very hot or rainy can help you plan your journey and arrive a bit calmer.
weather.empty: Select a state to see the latest forecast.
weather.error: We could not load the forecast right now.
weather.source: Data source: Malaysian Meteorological Department (via data.gov.my).
campus.title: Campus Map (TAR UMT)
campus.intro.title: Find your way around campus.
campus.intro.desc: Seeing where you are and where your class is can take away some of that “I’m lost and late” stress.
campus.loading: Finding where you are on campus...
campus.error: We don't have permission to see your location. You can still view the campus map without it.
campus.locationError: We could not get your current location right now. You can still explore the map.
campus.legend: Blue dot shows you, red marker shows the selected place. Walking towards it a bit earlier can help you arrive calmer.
campus.legend.noLocation: Map data © OpenStreetMap contributors. This map is meant to gently help you find your way, not track you.
support.title: My Safety & Support Plan
support.people.title: People who help you feel safe
support.people.desc: Save a few friends, family members, or mentors you can reach out to when things feel heavy. You control who appears here.
support.remove.title: Remove contact?
support.remove.desc: You can add them back anytime.
support.form.name: Name
support.form.value.error: Please add how to reach them
support.empty.title: No contacts added yet
support.empty.subtitle: Add 2–3 safe people you can contact quickly.
movement.title: Movement & Energy
movement.minutes.helper: Short sessions count. Even 5–10 mins helps reset.
movement.note.label: Notes (optional)
movement.note.hint: e.g. Walked with a friend between lectures
movement.nopressure: No pressure or diet talk here. Movement is about kindness to your body and easing study stress.
movement.ideas.title: Movement ideas for study days
movement.idea.stroll.title: Study break stroll
movement.idea.stroll.desc: 5–10 mins outside or in the hallway to reset your brain.
movement.idea.desk.title: Desk stretch
movement.idea.desk.desc: Neck rolls, shoulder circles, and wrist shakes between tasks.
movement.idea.cozy.title: Cozy yoga
movement.idea.cozy.desc: Slow stretches or child's pose before bed, comfy clothes encouraged.
movement.snapshot.title: Recent week snapshot
movement.snapshot.empty: Log a few walks or stretches to see your momentum. Even small moves count.
movement.snapshot.data: {days} active day(s) • average {minutes} mins per log
movement.list.title: Recent movement
movement.list.empty: No logs yet. A 5–10 minute stretch or walk is a great gentle start.
movement.logged: Logged {minutes} mins of {type}. Nice gentle effort!
period.title: Period & Cycle Tracker
period.calendar.title: Calendar view
period.calendar.empty: Add a period to see it highlighted on your calendar.
period.validate.missing: Please pick a start and end date for your period.
period.validate.order: End date cannot be before start date.
period.validate.range: Please choose a realistic duration between 1 and 14 days.
period.save.success: Cycle saved. Thanks for trusting us with this info.
period.stats.empty: Log a few periods to unlock gentle insights.
period.stats.addMore: Add another cycle to calculate your average cycle length.
period.stats.next: Next period is roughly {daysAway} days away (around {date}).
period.stats.wait: We will offer predictions once we have a couple of cycles.
period.list.title: Recent cycles
period.delete.title: Remove this cycle?
period.delete.desc: Your entries are private to your device. Deleting this record cannot be undone.
period.error.load: We could not load your cycles right now.
period.insights.title: Cycle insights
period.insights.note: Cycles are unique and can shift. These estimates are for your own awareness only ? not for contraception or medical decisions.
sleep.title: Sleep tracking
sleep.intro: Log your sleep and notice how it shapes your mood.
sleep.session.title: Simple sleep session
sleep.session.desc: Start a session when you tuck in. Tap "I'm awake" to log automatically.
sleep.session.note: We'll ask how rested you feel before saving your entry.
sleep.insights.empty: Log a few nights of sleep to unlock personalised insights.
sleep.insights.compare: On brighter mood days you averaged {brighter} of sleep, compared to {lower} on tougher days.
sleep.insights.moreData: As you add more moods and sleep logs, we'll look for patterns to help you find balance.
sleep.insights.default: Keep logging your sleep and moods; we will look for patterns without judgement.
sleep.recent.title: Recent sleep
sleep.error.load: We could not load your sleep right now.
sleep.error.refresh: Pull to refresh when you are ready.
sleep.empty: No sleep entries yet. Log tonight and we'll track it gently.
sleep.footer: Remember: poor sleep is never your fault. Small steps?like a wind-down playlist or a darker room?can help.
